quote_first: As Joe strode across the cemetery toward the church building at
quote_last: , two things surprised him. First was the number of volunteers who had already arrived ready to work. There were nearly twenty men standing around the grass in clusters of two or three, many of them sipping coffee they had brought with them.
title: Mistaken Identity
author: Josh McDowell and Ed Stewart

quote_last: The room appeared to be the quarters of a high-ranking member of the Soviet staff, now returned to the USSR. It was comfortably if sparely appointed and even had a computer terminal, a small NEC. She’d switched it on, tried to call up some files, but everything required a password. She could use it, however, as a clock.
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover

title: Shall We Tell the President?
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: McEnany looked at the clock in the corner of the video screen. It said
quote_last: . A few more keystrokes, and Paige Caldwell’s voice came through his headset.
title: Murderer's Row
author: Ray Keating
